room_title: Escape room "The Cure" by Greenville Escape Room in Greenville
room_address: 319 Garlington Rd Ste A-5 Greenville, SC 29615
room_description: A nefarious rogue group is intent on letting loose a massive bio-terror attack and creating havoc around the globe. Through our intelligence efforts, we’ve located the secret lab of their head chemist and we’re sending you in to find the antidote. The one problem is we don’t know where it’s hidden. You only have a 60-minute window to find it and escape without being caught.
